book.title: Interview with the Vampire (The Vampire Chronicles #1)
book.description: Storyline: Interview With The Vampire (The Vampire Chronicles #1) Here are the confessions of a vampire. Hypnotic, shocking, and chillingly erotic, this is a novel of mesmerizing beauty and astonishing force—a story of danger and flight, of love and loss, of suspense and resolution, and of the extraordinary power of the senses. It is a novel only Anne Rice could write.
book.author: Anne Rice
